thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com | 5 of 27
thread.title: Vanessa S.

author: Vanessa S.
title: Vanessa S.
text: The girls at my LaserAway location are so nice and make the experience easy and stress free. It can be nerve-wracking to get undressed and have someone up close and personal with a laser, but my experience at LA has been the opposite. The girls are warm and friendly and do their best to make you feel comfortable. I highly recommend Laser Away, they are a very professional and customer-oriented establishment.
